title: NAVI push past G2 to reach Major playoffs
description: The PGL Copenhagen Major champions return to Major playoffs after missing out in Shanghai.

title: s1mple powers FaZe into Major playoffs over The MongolZ
description: s1mple is headed to his first Major playoff in over two and a half years.

title: Final group stage matches of Austin Major set
description: Just three spots in the playoffs remain up for grabs as the Swiss group of Stage 3 draws to a close.

title: Vitality brush aside Virtus.pro to book playoff spot
description: The world No. 1 made light work of their opponents to seal a 3-1 record in Stage 3.

title: FURIA make first Major playoffs in two-and-a-half years
description: After three successive group stage exits, FURIA will be back in the arena for a Major quarter-final.

title: paiN oust Nemiga from Austin Major
description: The Brazilians recovered from a bad start to the series and live to fight another day.

title: paiN eliminate 3DMAX from Austin Major
description: The Frenchmen have been eliminated from the Major after a 0-2 loss to the Brazilian squad.

title: Legacy see off Lynn Vision to keep playoff dream alive
description: The Chinese team has been sent packing in 12th-14th place.

title: Aurora-MOUZ elimination bout headlines Day 3
description: MOUZ are out of the frying pan and into the fire in Stage 3.

title: Short news: Week 24
description: FaZe out of HLTV top 10 for the first time in 3.5 years.

title: CS2 news, highlights, tips and tricks
description: Small quality of life adjustments in latest update.

title: BIG to keep roster, promise structural changes: "We haven't managed to convert the potential"
description: BIG's CGO says the setup around the team will be overhauled after a poor first half of 2025.

title: HLTV Confirmed: Roster news, Major expansion, and season preview
description: Chad "SPUNJ" Burchill, Milan "Striker" Švejda, and Zvonimir "Professeur" Burazin return to your screens and live streams with updated roster news.

title: Rostermania tracker
description: HEROIC trio lands at Falcons. Falcons confirm NiKo. FaZe in talks with EliGE.

title: HEROIC reveal new roster
description: Yasin "xfl0ud" Koç, Álvaro "SunPayus" García, Andrey "tN1R" Tatarinovich, Linus "LNZ" Holtäng, and Simon "yxngstxr" Boije form the new HEROIC lineup.

title: HLTV Confirmed with STYKO talking roster changes and CS2 meta
description: The recently benched Slovakian will share his insight on the game and rostermania.

title: MOUZ snap Aurora's playoff streak, enter 2-2 pool in Austin
description: The European combine live to fight another day at the Major.

title: MOUZ consign Liquid to last place in Stage 3 despite ultimate's 45-kill decider
description: It was a nail-biting finish to the series, which went all the way to a 30-round decider.

title: KSCERATO: "We finally did it. It was a really tough journey since the Rio Major"
description: The Brazilian rifler spoke to HLTV after his team secured a spot in the playoffs of the BLAST.tv Austin Major.

title: Spirit cap off convincing run to Austin Major playoffs with 2-0 win over NAVI
description: The Russian powerhouse are the first team to book a spot in the quarter-finals of the Major.
